name: @jsquash/png
description: Wasm png encoder and decoder supporting the browser. Repackaged from Squoosh App.

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp -r codec package.json README.md CHANGELOG.md .npmignore ../../LICENSE dist
scripts.prepublishOnly: [[ "$PWD" == *'/dist' ]] && exit 0 || (echo 'Please run npm publish from the dist directory' && exit 1)
